bio:
Yar gro-Gatuk, an Orc man, is one of the Hunters of Hircine. Hircine is the Daedric Lord of the Hunt. Yar and the other Hunters of Hircine have been sent to Bloated Man's Grotto, which is located in the mountains at the northern edge of Falkreath Hold. Yar carries a bow and arrows, and an iron dagger.
Yar and the other Hunters have been tasked by Lord Hircine with killing the werewolf Sinding, in order to send him to the Hunting Grounds. The Hunting Grounds is the afterlife destination associated with Hircine, and is where the souls of all werewolves and followers of Hircine are sent after their death. If the player expresses the intention to attack and kill Sinding, Yar will help the player, and be friendly with the player after Sinding is killed. If the player indicates that they intend to help Sinding, Yar will become offended and hostile to the player.
name: Yar gro-Gatuk
